casebody.data:
State ex rel. Mclntyre
v.
Summit Cty. Court of Common Pleas 2015-0080 Supreme Court of Ohio. June 6, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In Mandamus and Prohibition. On motion for supplemental issuance of writ of mandamus. Motion denied.

O'Connor, C.J., not participating.
